relationships.description: Severus has a conversation with Dumbledore about keeping someone safe. ("And what will you give me in return, Severus?", "Rather like you, Severus.")
Severus hopes that Voldemort would spare someone. ("Rather like you, Severus. Weren’t you hoping that Lord Voldemort would spare her?")
